latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Green Super Rice for the Resource Poor of Asia and Africa (GSR) - Phase 2

dsDescriptionValue.value: 1. Assessing the performance of GSR varieties;   2. Initial tracking of seed distribution among farmers of their first harvest;   3. Identify farmers' response and reaction to the performance of GSR varieties;   4. Similar approach will be implemented in Bangladesh as soon as the seeds are available and  5. Monitoring of GSR varieties performance across seasons.

keywordValue.value: Rice production, cost and return, varietal adoption, household characteristics

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 200;

value: Laguna:   Famy, Mabitac, Majayjay, Siniloan and Sta. Maria
